--- In junit@y..., "Berin Loritsch" <bloritsch@a...> wrote:
> interface Store
> {
>     void store(String key, Object val);
>     Object retrieve(String key);
>     void remove(String key);
> }
> 
> That interface is enough to know how to use the object store.

Yes. So please explain: What tests do you need to sufficiently test 
every possible implementation of this interface? How did you find 
them?

Curious, Ilja
